longBusinessSummary: Silver Storm Mining Ltd., a mineral resource exploration company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties. The company explores for silver, zinc, copper, lead, and gold deposits. It holds a 100% interest in the San Diego property that consists of 4 mining concessions covering an area of 91.65 hectares located in Durango State, Mexico. The company was formerly known as Golden Tag Resources Ltd. and changed its name to Silver Storm Mining Ltd. in November 2023. Silver Storm Mining Ltd. was incorporated in 1995 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
